wogwt.translatable.http
Class PeriodicUpdater

java.lang.Object
  wogwt.translatable.http.Updater
      wogwt.translatable.http.PeriodicUpdater

public class PeriodicUpdater
extends Updater

This class will do an ajax request every X milliseconds to the url specified by the updateContainer's "updateUrl" attribute and replace the contents of the updateContainer with the response. To use this, your WOComponent should have something like this: PeriodicUpdateContainer : WOGenericContainer { invokeAction = yourAction; updateUrl = context.componentActionURL; elementName = "div"; id = "yourid"; }
